ovdesc.p: Agents have a separate arrangement for themselves and are created based on the terms agreed with the financial institution. Whenever agents generate new business from their customers, a financial arrangement is created in either lending, deposit or accounts product line. The financial arrangement should know at what instances a commission processing has to be triggered. This necessitates the need for a new property class on the financial arrangement side to capture the commission events & negotiations on the default commission rate (optional).
With this new property class, it will be possible to
• Record the agent & the agent arrangement for a financial arrangement
• What are the default events that trigger commissions
o Events can be related to online or scheduled commissions.
o For online commissions the business activity’s description would be defaulted
o For scheduled commission, the frequency’s description would be defaulted
• Ability to provide a spread over the default commission rates
• Ability to provide an overriding amount, as against the predefined commission calculation

desc.p: Indicates the interest property based on which the scheduled commission is calculated. Should be an interest property on AA.PROPERTY
Defines the margin operand to be used on top of the default commission rate. Allowed values are Add / Subtract
Defines a percentage is applied over the default commission amount, to calculate the final commission for a financial arrangement. Is used in conjunction with MARGIN.OPERAND.
Defines a rate that is applied over the default commission rate to calculate the actual commission for a financial arrangement. Is used in conjunction with MARGIN.OPERAND.
Hold the agent’s arrangement ID, based on which commissions have to be calculated. Should be a valid AA.ARRANGEMENT (AGENT LINE)
This is a system updated field. Holds the business activity that that should trigger an online commission. Should be a valid record on AA.ACTIVITY
Holds the agent ID from CUSTOMER table
The commission that gets paid to the agent on the defined schedule. Should be a charge property with type commission on AA.PROPERTY
Actual frequency on which commission gets paid.
This is a system updated field. Holds the frequency name for which a scheduled online commission should be triggered. Should be a valid record on AA.AGENT.COMMISSION.FREQUENCY
